Description: Narrow glazed composition kohl flask; modelled; pale buff core; glaze not preserved; cylindrical upper part flaring slightly to globular base terminating in a slight point; linear decoration in thin black paint, long-stemmed lotus flowers on upper body and lotus blossoms on lower part, divided by double horizontal lines.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 237)
